Action.body: Since, as per my last comment, Ingress didn't work out, because docker needs a DNS ip, instead of a DNS name which is provided by Ingress. So, plan dropped for Ingress and decided to expose the Kube-dns on a nodeport and then create an ngnix proxy to operate Kube-DNS on port 53
